ServerIP.Description: The IP address of the custom server. Leave it empty to use the default server IP address.

ServerPort.Description: The port of the custom server. Leave it empty to use the default port (10998).

ServerPassword.Description: The password for the custom server. Leave it empty if the server doesn't have a password.

ShowNameTags.Description:
Hotkey: F2. 
Whether to show the username of the player above their ball.

NameTagSize.Description:
Hotkey: F2 and +/-. 
The size of the name tags. 
Default size is 48.

PlayerCountMode.Description:
Hotkey: F3. 
How the number of players playing each stage, course, and mode are shown. Valid values are "Mixed", "ExactMode", "SumOfStages", and "Disabled".

EnableChat.Description:
Hotkey: F4. 
Whether to show chat messages. If this is disabled you will not be able to send or receive chat messages.

PlayerVisibility.Description:
Hotkey: F5. 
The visibility of the other players. Valid values are "ShowAll", "HideNear", and "HideAll".

PersonalSpace.Description:
Hotkey: F5 and +/-. 
When using HideNear player visibility, how far away a player needs to be before they are visible. Measured as the distance from the line between the camera and your player''s ball. 
Default distance is 4.
